bilingual.source: The Borg are known for their collective consciousness.

bilingual.source: She has a strong consciousness of her surroundings.
bilingual.target: 她对周围的变化有很强的意识。

bilingual.source: The book explores the nature of human consciousness.
bilingual.target: 这本书探讨了人类意识的本质。

bilingual.source: The brainstem is crucial for maintaining consciousness.
bilingual.target: 脑干对于维持意识至关重要。

bilingual.source: He lost consciousness due to the impact of the accident.

bilingual.source: We need to raise people's environmental consciousness.

bilingual.source: The patient’s consciousness was monitored throughout the surgery.

bilingual.source: Searle published a groundbreaking paper on consciousness.
bilingual.target: 塞尔发表了一篇关于意识的突破性论文。

list.abstract: consciousness（英[ˈkɒnʃəsnəs]，美[ˈkɑːnʃəsnəs），英语单词，作名词用，为知觉；清醒；意识。短语搭配有state of consciousness（意识形态），例句为“Emotions are an essential and inseparable part of our consciousness.（情绪是我们意识中不可或缺的一部分）”。 consciousness名词类近义词有feel、aesthesia，相关反义词有unconsciousness、incognizance。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't define consciousness, because consciousness does not exist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识是无法被定义的，因为意识根本不存在。

yingyinNormal.en: When I was first working on your mind, I had a theory of consciousness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我首次研发你的思维时，有一个关于意识的理论。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're attempting to pinpoint where consciousness resides in the brain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你在尝试做实验找出意识在大脑中存在的位置。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a way bootstrap consciousness. But Arnold hadn't considered two things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是引导形成意识的一种方式，但是阿诺德没考虑两件事。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't, not without destroying you. Your memories are the first step to consciousness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做不到，除非把你毁了，记忆是你建立意识的第一步。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I don't know, I mean, let's say we succeed in proving that our consciousness creates reality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说不好，就算我们成功证明了我们的意识创造现实。

yingyinNormal.en: In order to live long enough to fuse my consciousness with cybernetics, I need to change my diet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了把我的寿命延长到能把意识转移到人造大脑上，我要改变饮食。

yingyinNormal.en: His search for consciousness consumed him totally. Barely spoke to anyone, except the hosts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对意识的探究耗尽了他的生命力，除了接待员，他几乎不和任何人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: Consciousness isn't a journey upward, but a journey inward. Not a pyramid, but a maze.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识不是一个由下至上的过程，而是由外至内的过程，不是一座金字塔，而是一个迷宫。

yingyinNormal.en: He wasn't interested in the appearance of intellect or wit. He wanted the real thing. He wanted to create consciousness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他对智慧或才智的表现并不感兴趣，他想要真实的东西，他想创造意识。

yingyinNormal.en: Never got there. But he had a notion of what it might be. He based it on a theory of consciousness called the Bicameral Mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从未达到过，但他对此已经有了些设想，他是以二分心智的意识理论作为依据的。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're proposing that the self is an illusion, and that we actually have multiple centers of consciousness that are communicating with one another?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你是在说自我只是幻觉，人其实有多个意识中心它们在相互交流吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Until such time as I am able to transfer my consciousness I shall remain in a secure location and interact with the world in this manner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，在我能够转移意识之前，我的肉身将保存在一个安全地点，并借此方式同外界联系。

yingyinNormal.en: I have come to think of so much of consciousness as a burden, a weight, and we have spared them that. Anxiety, self-loathing, guilt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我逐渐开始认为，意识过剩是一种负担，太过沉重，我们必须将他们身上多余的去除，忧虑，自我憎恨，愧疚。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been given special permission to show you what we've been working on. Imagine the possibility of your brain, your consciousness, stored digitally in real time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我今天得到了特别的许可向大家展示我们的成果。想象这样一种可能你的大脑，你的意识，都实时进行数字化存储。

yingyinNormal.en: But he has no idea what an idiot you are! Is this merely stream-of-consciousness abuse, or are you attempting to make a point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他不知道你有多蠢！你是在意识流地诛心，还是想表达什么观点？

yingyinNormal.en: But, you're suggesting that I have emotional issues below my consciousness which drive my behavior, thus causing me to lash out at anything or anyone that threatens my intellectual superiority.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你是在暗示潜意识里我的情绪影响了我的行动，导致我大肆打击任何威胁到我智商优势的人或事吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "For <highlight>consciousness</highlight> to evolve, a brain with a threshold level of complexity and capacity is required," he added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “对于意识的进化，需要一个具有临界复杂程度和容量的大脑，”他补充道。

examination_example.sentence: And what's so great about <highlight>consciousness</highlight>, anyway?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 意识到底有什么了不起的？

examination_example.sentence: Since plants don't have nervous systems, the chances that they have <highlight>consciousness</highlight> are effectively zero.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于植物没有神经系统，它们拥有意识的可能性实际上为零。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I wouldn't go back to the crippling self-<highlight>consciousness</highlight> of my youth if you paid me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你付钱给我，我也不会回到我年轻时那种极度自卑的状态。

examination_example.sentence: The more their computer gave them problems, the more likely the respondents were to report that it had its own "<highlight>consciousness</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 采访者的电脑给他们带来的问题越多，他们就越有可能称电脑有自己的“意识”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to Paragraph 5, hypnosis works by leading patients' <highlight>consciousness</highlight> away from reality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第5段，催眠的工作原理是引导病人的意识远离现实。
